title: Very pleased hard to get part  in the‚Ä¶
text: Very pleased hard to get part  in the UK bought and delivered via Buy and Ship. Just need to be patient as the supply lines are long. Definitely recommend and would use again.

title: BNS protection is a scam - LOST PARCEL NO COMPENSATION
text:
BNS protection is a scam. My shipment from UPS has arrived at BNS US warehouse 2 weeks ago, and it is nowhere to be found. Messaged customer service a dozen times and all they would reply is ‚Äúchecking‚Äù. BNS would not honor its obligation of compensating for lost parcel. I am coordinating with other local victims to file joint police report for BNS‚Äôs commercial fraud. AVOID AT ALL COST.

Update: BNS said it was UPS‚Äôs fault (despite UPS‚Äôs website‚Äôs proof of delivery) and refused to make compensation. This is absolutely ridiculous and definitely a scam.

title: Extremely slow support and unclear process left time-sensitive parcels stuck
text:
Based on my personal experience, Buyandship‚Äôs customer support response time is extremely slow, which became a serious problem for a time-sensitive shipment.

Several parcels were automatically forwarded from the US warehouse to the Hong Kong warehouse, and only after this auto-forwarding did I learn that the items (perfumes) were considered regulated / prohibited for onward shipment. There was no clear warning or system block before forwarding, which resulted in the parcels being stuck and placed the burden on the customer to resolve an issue created by the process itself.

I contacted customer service to clarify what options were actually available, including whether self-collection was possible and what the exact requirements were. Despite these being straightforward questions, responses consistently took many hours to over a full day, even when marked as active.

Replies were often generic or only partially answered, leading to repeated back-and-forth over multiple days. As of writing, I still do not have clear, complete answers, and the situation remains unresolved.

What makes this especially frustrating is that the in-app messaging states a typical response time of around one hour, which does not reflect reality. There were also instances where customer service agents appeared online, yet messages remained unanswered for long periods. There is also no clear escalation path for urgent cases.

While perfumes are listed as regulated items, the lack of clear, proactive communication before auto-forwarding, combined with extremely slow follow-up support, caused unnecessary delay, uncertainty, and disruption.

For a logistics service handling customers‚Äô parcels and money, this level of response time and lack of clarity is unacceptable. Faster responses, clearer upfront warnings, and proper handling of time-sensitive issues are urgently needed.
reply_text:
Hi Jeff, 

Thank you very much for sharing your feedback. We are truly sorry that your experience did not go as smoothly as we had hoped.

Since all of our parcels travel by air, perfumes are classified as flammable and are strictly prohibited on flights. That is why they are always included on our prohibited items list (you may view the full list here: https://www.buyandship.com.sg/restrictions/#all).

At the moment, our system is unable to automatically detect prohibited items when members submit product links. However, it‚Äôs something we‚Äôre actively looking into adding in future.

Our customer support team operates from Monday through Saturday, and we are doing our best to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible. Regarding your case, our customer service representative will reach out to you shortly to discuss the pick-up arrangements.

Please do not hesitate to contact us if there is anything else we can assist you with. Thank you once again for your patience and understanding.

title: Used mercari proxy service but got‚Ä¶
text: Used mercari proxy service but got issue with wrong item received, contacted with customer service but they only can blacklist and no compensation. Please reconsider when purchasing high value item through mercari proxy service. Try to find reputable seller on other platform or other method beside using the mercari proxy service by Buy&Ship
reply_text:
Hi Afiq, 

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback. We are truly sorry to hear that your experience didn‚Äôt go as smoothly as we‚Äôd hoped.

Mercari is a C2C marketplace, which means the quality and condition of items can vary and aren‚Äôt guaranteed by us. That‚Äôs why we display clear warning and ask for your confirmation before you complete the purchase. By doing so, we believe we‚Äôve fulfilled our responsibility to make you aware of this before the transaction.

We completely understand how frustrating this must be for you. That's why we've already escalated the situation to Mercari and asked them to take action against the seller. 

Please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out if there‚Äôs anything else we can help you with.

title: Love this company and very helpful
text: Love this company and very helpful

title: Hidden fees and Slow Delivery
text:
Used the buy for me option. From the time they received the goods from the merchant till I received it - took 14 days. It sat in their warehouse for days before being routed through HK. 

Paid 6% service fee for the buying service, THEN billed another $ for shipping. And finally when it reached the local courier, was billed ANOTHER $ for local delivery, which included a flat $20 processing fee + import tax. 3 separate bills, the last of which was not through Buy&Ship but direct to the courier service. 

Costs were not upfront and coupled with the super slow shipment (I had other purchases from China which was further away and reach me within 3 days, shipped direct), makes their service difficult to recommend.

I would only use their service again if I had no other options.
reply_text:
Hi Jason,

Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We truly appreciate it and are sorry to hear that your recent experience didn‚Äôt meet your expectations.

For clarity on the fees, all our charges are listed transparently on our website (https://www.buyandship.com.sg/features/proxy-shopping/) under the ‚ÄúHow Does Buy&Ship Charge?‚Äù section. The S$20 you were charged is solely the processing fee that the last-mile courier is required to collect. Separately, the GST was applied in accordance with Singapore government regulations, which mandate GST on shipments with a declared value of S$400 or above. We always recommend checking the GST details on our website (https://www.buyandship.com.sg/taxation/) before shipping. 

Regarding the delivery process, all parcels are first routed to our Hong Kong warehouse for consolidation. Once consolidation is complete, we normally hand the shipment over to our last-mile delivery partner within 1‚Äì2 business days.

Our customer support team is always here to help. If you have any further questions or need anything clarified, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out via live chat on our website ‚Äî we‚Äôd be happy to help and make your next experience a much smoother one.

title: 0 stars! Extremely Disappointing Experience. Would Never Recommend.
text:
Terrible experience with Buy&Ship. They received my order at their US warehouse on Nov 10, and it was consolidated at their HK warehouse on Nov 18, then packed on Nov 19. It‚Äôs now Nov 28, and my shipment STILL hasn‚Äôt been dispatched.

Their customer service has been completely unhelpful. Instead of providing a clear explanation of what‚Äôs causing the delay, they just keep repeating that it ‚Äúshould only take 1‚Äì2 working days‚Äù after consolidation to ship out. Clearly, that‚Äôs not the case.

This has been incredibly frustrating, especially since my purchase was quite large. Be very careful using their service‚Äîespecially for high-value items. Based on this experience, I would never recommend Buy&Ship and will never use them again. üò°
reply_text:
Hi Charles, 

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We sincerely apologize for the delay in dispatching your order.

Recently, we identified that our previous last-mile logistics partner was underperforming. To ensure your parcel is delivered safely and on time, we have transitioned some shipments to a new and more reliable logistics partner.

This change required a few days to finalize the updated processes and workflows, which unfortunately led to the delay in your shipment.

We truly appreciate your patience and understanding during this transition. We‚Äôre pleased to confirm that your order will be dispatched today.

Thank you once again for your kind understanding and continued trust in us.

title: SOLID EXPERIENCE
text: Wanted to buy a specific Alpinestars bag, which I couldn‚Äôt find anywhere from my local shops in Singapore. And Alpinestars couldn‚Äôt ship to Singapore. So I decided to use their forwarding service. Which I would say its a pleasent experience as it was easy to request items. And delivery timing wasn‚Äôt too bad which is a plus. Will definitely engage their services if I want to purchase stuff from Europe.

title: Questionable service
text:
I requested for two books to be purchased and paid the full amount including shipping. However, only one book came during delivery. Customer service is slow and unresponsive when asked for a reason (e.g. whether buyer did not purchase or the parcel got lost) and a refund for only the item that was not fufilled. It's been near a month of waiting. 

Customer service keep saying they will get back and asked for photos only after a week of the reported incident. Since then have waited for another 4 weeks for an update.

title: Company messed up my order with another‚Ä¶
text:
Company messed up my order with another customer's order, which resulted in 3 weeks of delay and stress - having to post the items to the other customer and keep pressuring the other customer to send me my items. Company also failed to provide tracking number via the app until I reached out to customer service. App only updated the tracking number after the parcel arrived.

Company failed to deliver upon compensations they themselves proposed. Company has zero accountability, and has terrible services. Customer service also responded very slowly. Only way to get in touch with human customer service is via email or the app chat, no calls available.
reply_text:
Hi Nicholas, 

Thank you for your feedback. We're truly sorry that your experience fell short of expectations. It appears our warehouse team accidentally swapped the labels, and unfortunately the parcel had already shipped to the UK before we caught the mistake.

Although your parcels have now arrived safely, we are truly sorry for the delay and sincerely thank you for your patience while we coordinated with the other parties involved. As a heartfelt apology, we‚Äôve added some credits to your account to help make up for the inconvenience.

Since our team is based in the Asia-Pacific region, there may be times when our responses don‚Äôt align perfectly with your time zone. Rest assured, we‚Äôre doing our very best to reply as quickly as possible during our office hours.

If you need any further assistance, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out via the live chat on our website. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: Four weeks to forward item, 4 weeks to ship, terrible customer service
text:
I made a high value purchase to be forwarded by these guys from HK to Australia. It took them four weeks to process it and have it released to the courier. They also didn't provide the forms to the courier Aramex, which delayed it another three weeks. 

Their customer service system is slow and unsupportive.

I have used many drop ship services before, most are great. This was the first one I‚Äôve used in Hong Kong. These guys are useless. They have one job - get something and forward it. 

My strong advice - use a different service.

title: Was a loyal customer for 2 years but since they partnered Ninjavan I lost 4 parcels
text:
I've a shipment that has been marked as packed for a week with no other updates. The other 2 packages I consolidated at the same time so far via Jump Point have already been received by me. Asked CS what's the status of my shipment and they keep asking me for product purchase screenshots, product tracking numbers, but I don't see how they need it when all my 10 parcels are already packed and has a tracking number generated and has cleared customs already. Unless you're telling me all my 10 parcels are still separately landing in my country one by one before they tag the shipment tracking number to it, which makes no bloody sense. I'm going in circles puking blood talking to CS and all I want to know is where is my shipment, not my individual parcels (those are already inside the damn shipment). Why do you need all 10 product details and tracking numbers to locate my packed shipment? Unless it's not been packed at all? I'm going to treat the shipment as missing if it still has no updates after another week. 

Update: They indeed lost 4 of my parcels. They offered to refund me some amount, but there's no reason given as to why it got lost. Will need to check if they will really refund me or not in 30 days or I have to keep chasing. 
I'm not sure if the fault is with Ninjavan now or BnS. Not sure if UPS is worth trying either based on the terrible sg reviews. So far Janio has never lost my parcels but they have changed delivery providers.

title: Easy interface
text:
Easy interface, dummy-proof and a good way to ship products from overseas to Singapore or to other countries. 

Only thing is to ALWAYS CHECK your weight, they almost overcharge me with 5kg or some sort lol.

title: do NOT use this service
text: do NOT use this service. you will get NO help and you WILL LOSE your parcel if you try to use Amazon with their US warehouse.

title: From ‚Äúnew in box‚Äù to crushed box ‚Äî plus 5 parcels stuck with no contact
text:
I used Buyandship to forward multiple brand-new, ‚Äúwith box‚Äù sneakers purchased on eBay.
In the shipments I actually received, more than half of the shoe boxes were crushed or visibly altered (cutouts, heavy tape/markings). At first I suspected the sellers, but looking at their feedback history and typical packing, this does not appear to be how they ship. The damage/alterations likely happened during Buyandship‚Äôs warehousing or repacking.

Separately, five more items that arrived at the Hong Kong warehouse on Jul 9 have shown ‚ÄúUnder Customs Clearance‚Äù ever since. It‚Äôs now almost two months with no meaningful update, no case number, no check-in logs, no customs entry number, and no reason given‚Äîonly generic messages.

I can accept that customs can be slow. What I cannot accept is no transparency and no accountability. Between the damaged ‚Äúnew in box‚Äù items and the five parcels effectively missing in HK, this has been a very poor experience. I would not use this service again.

title: Shady Company That Conveniently Decides Your Item Is Prohibited
text:
I received an email saying one of my shipments has problem but did not indicate which shipment and what was the problem. Only after chatting with the CSO Jackie did he/she mentioned that one of the shipments contained scissors and cannot be shipped because it is a prohibited item.

Argued with Jackie that no where in the website did it mention that scissors are prohibited items and I have previously shipped scissors using Buy&Ship without problems so why now. Jackie insisted that scissors are sharp items and may be detained by customs so they don't recommend shipping. Notice the word Jackie used was recommend and not because it is by law.

I questioned Jackie in that case why is it that Buy&Ship can ship the scissors from Japan where I bought, to Hong Kong warehouse then. He/she could not answer me and finally gave in and processed my shipments but told me not to ship such items again.

This is not my first time having bad experience with Buy&Ship but is probably my last time as I decided not to use their service anymore; and so decided to write a review for people to refer especially for first timers who are thinking of using their service.

I include the full chat log below. Judge for yourself if this company is worth your money.

--------------------------------------------------------------
Me: hi, i received an email saying my shipment has problem but did not specify which item and what problem

Buy&Ship: Your order (91973354) contains prohibited item (scrissors)and can't be shipped. You may:
Ôªø1. Discard the prohibited item and we will ship the rest
Ôªø2. Arrange courier to our warehouse to pick up whole order and ship to you. (Please provide the shipping label & invoice at least 1 working day before the date of pick up)
Ôªø3. Ship the whole order to a HK address. (Please provide recipient name, phone number and address)
Kindly note that there will be no refund of shipping fee as the fee is counted from overseas warehouse, also the parcel has violated our shipping restriction. The shipment can be stored in the Hong Kong warehouse for the next 30 days and will be auto-abandonment without further notice if no handling instruction is received within the storage period.

Please let us know your decision, thank you

Me: why is scissors prohibited? under which category? i ever shipped scissors before. why now it is prohibited?

Buy&Ship: The scissors are considered as sharp items and may be detained by the customs.
Therefore, we don't recommend to ship with it.
Thank you

Me: your country dont sell scissors?
then why you can ship from japan to hong kong?

Buy&Ship: We have noted your concern and will inform the warehouse to ship out in one time exception.
Please do not ship this kind of items to the warehouse again.
Thank you

Me: in that case you should also indicate scissors as prohibited items. i only see knives and blades mentioned

Buy&Ship: We will forward your comment to the related department and review the website info.
Thank you

--------------------------------------------------------------

Reply to Buy&Ship 28 August 2025
So one supplier cannot ship but another supplier can. What a joke! Since when suppliers can make up their own law to determine what can be shipped and cannot be shipped.

I checked in Singapore customs website and no where is it stated that scissors are prohibited items. Either your supplier is smoking you or you are smoking me. The more excuses you come up with, the more it looks bad on you. Shouldn‚Äôt you do your due diligence to verify each country‚Äôs custom law instead of relying on your suppliers and left users hanging to dry when shit happens!
reply_text:
Hi Chang, 

We appreciate you sharing your feedback and apologize that your experience wasn't ideal. Shipping restrictions to Singapore can change due to evolving import regulations, so we rely on our suppliers to stay updated on what can be sent. We've checked with other providers and have arranged an alternative shipping solution for you.

For future orders, we suggest contacting our customer service team first for any items that might have shipping restrictions. We truly appreciate your patience and understanding.

title: 4 shipments stuck at US customs since July 25

4 shipments stuck at US customs since early July 2025. When asked, only TEMPLATE REPLIES given.
AVOID for now. üëéüèº‚ùå
reply_text:
Hi Ken Tan, 

We appreciate your feedback and apologize that your experience has fallen short. These delays are rare and caused by sudden changes to electronic gadget export regulations.

We‚Äôve been checking in every day on the status of the batch and confirmed it is still being held by the U.S. Customs for inspection. Because it‚Äôs under review, we don‚Äôt have an exact delivery time yet. Rest assured, we‚Äôre fully cooperating with Customs and providing everything needed to help speed things along.

We will continue to keep you informed and notify you via email or app as soon as there are any updates.

Currently, the batch is still being held in the U.S. Customs for review. As it is under customs inspection, we unfortunately cannot provide an exact time of arrival. Please be assured that we are working closely with Customs and promptly providing all requested information to help expedite the process.

We will keep you informed on the status and notify you via email or app notification as soon as we¬†have¬†updates.

title: Always request your seller to pack with hard box with thick padding
text:
my paddle is completely destroyed and not way to repair. It was crashed from side and both side of paddle badly indented. in order to have damage like this, it need very heavy impact or heavy item from top while the paddle side is facing top. At least 100kg of force apply on top in order to have that damaged.

my paddle is soft pack(thanks to my clever seller even mention will ship oversea and request secure and nice packing) and that is the main cause of the damaged. However, even if my seller pack with box... the paddle will not survive either, maybe just less severe. With just a box and few layers bubble wrap, it will not enough. This is because i have passed shipment with box and the  box was badly deform when reach my hand. Imagine the length of the box is around 30" become 26" to 27" with 1 side crashed. Too bad, i cant share the photo here or else you wont have to imagine how it looks like. Anyway, that was lucky that everything is working because there is another hard product box that protecting all the items.

Lastly, do read clearly about the insurance cover that provide in Buy&Ship. If item damaged, only 30% of shipping fee can be claimed. Another words, the insurance only covering loss parcel and damaged items are not consider claimable but partial refund shipping fee. So, the insurance is pretty much useless because 80% are shipment damaged problem while loss item maybe 20% or lower.

title: I‚Äôve used similar services before
text:
I‚Äôve used similar services before, and they were terrible. When purchasing from multiple stores, those other services (Starts with a Vxxx) failed to notify me if all packages had arrived for consolidation. They didn‚Äôt provide updates on parcel status unless I paid extra for upgrades, which made the process confusing and costly. Ultimately, due to this lack of transparency, I ended up paying five times more compared to when I switched to Buy&Ship!

Buy&Ship completely changed my experience. Their instructions are clear and straightforward, there was no need to second guess the information. What you see is exactly what you get! They provide an itemized list of items that have arrived at their location, so you can easily track if all your purchases are ready for consolidation and shipping. Another great feature is their notification system, which informs you how many days of free storage you have left before incurring charges... they typically offer 30 days for free storage. I‚Äôve tried their service, and it‚Äôs truly awesome!

reply_text:
Hi customer,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations. After reviewing, we found that the parcel you shipped was oversized, and we were in touch with you to agree on how to handle it.

After your parcel was imported to Singapore, local authorities charged GST of around $100 due to the high value of the parcels. This charge is based on local regulations and was not applied by us.

To help make future shipments easier, we recommend checking the size limits, prohibited items, and GST policies on our website or APP.

If you need any further assistance, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out via the live chat on our website. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: Extremely risky - poor tracking and item arrived without warning
text:
The tracking is awful if you use Buy&ship's own courier. I tried looking but couldn't find details on the arrival date.

In addition, the status of the item when it is in the delivery stage is inaccurate.

This became extrenely dangerous when my item arrived without warning at my house. When I saw it, it had already been sitting there for half a day.

What I was shipping was an out of production bowling ball. Every piece has a slightly unique pattern, and I found one whose weight and pattern were just what I wanted.

This package was sitting outside my house for hours. Anyone could have walked up and stole it, and I would have no way of replacing it.

To me, this is unacceptable and frankly, I'm afraid to use Buy&ship again.
reply_text:
Hi Maplestruck, 

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations. We have shared your case with our logistics supplier. Please rest assured that we continuously monitor and evaluate the performance of our third-party partners to ensure their efficiency meets our business standards. We truly appreciate your patience and understanding as we work to enhance our service. Thank you.

title: Very long transshipment times
text: Very long transshipment times, cannot SMS authenticate phone number, very bad service overall, totally unreliable service.
reply_text:
Hi customer,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations. After checking our system, we found that the SMS authorization code was mistakenly not sent out automatically. This issue has now been fixed, and the code has been sent to the registered phone number.

Currently, the transit time from our US warehouse to the Hong Kong warehouse starts after the parcel arrives at our overseas warehouse. We usually hand over your order to our last-mile delivery partners the next day after the parcels are consolidated in Hong Kong.

If you need any further assistance, please don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out to us via the website live chat. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: Fris time user
text: Fris time user. The chat provided better clarity on the shipping procedure. Had hoped the procedure was mentioned somewhere instead of us asking.

title: Good
text: Good, trustable

title: B&S make overseas shopping so easy and‚Ä¶
text:
B&S make overseas shopping so easy and convenient. 

Cheaper shipping fees cos they allow multiple order consolidation.

Highly recommended.

title: Good service, but can be improved
text: Good service to engage especially for overseas online shopping that ships to domestic address only. However I feel it is unnecessary for all purchases to be shipped and consolidated at HK warehouse. This only lengthens the overall shipment duration. There should be an option where users can just consolidate shipments within each overseas warehouse address itself and thereafter ship directly to final destination. Order status is often delayed and one will need to constantly email the support team for latest status, which thankfully is prompt to respond.

title: Fast and easy
text: Fast and easy to use - had difficulty ordering an item from a korean website.  Decides to use the buy n shop function.  Items were delivered timely and in good condition

title: I am a 1st time user and clueless at times
text:
I am a 1st time user. Price for shipping seems reasonable. Shipping duration could be better. Response from customer service is swift. 
However, at some point, I do not know what to do, what is the next step. For example, after I made my declaration there was no prompt to say, u have made the declaration, please ‚Ä¶.. or my items reached the US address, I did received a notification but then what? What do I do next?

title: Every process goes smoothly
text: Every process goes smoothly. Fee charged is reasonable and is lower than what sellers normally quote.

title: Speed up the process
text: Speed up the process. It was quite lengthy; but i dont think i'd blame B&S for this matter.

title: Excellent service
text: Excellent service. The price is acceptable. The duration for the item to arrive is perfect. One improvement that I want to address is that Buyandship+ should include ‚Äòused items‚Äô coverage (not just return items). I know it is tricky to make sure it is a genuine claim but I think you should take a look at it. I love to buy used items from outside Malaysia for my own personal use.

title: Easy to setup account and ship my‚Ä¶
text: Easy to setup account and ship my products. It would have been better if i could use my actual name instead of a code for my last name, but I'm just nitpicking. And also shipping times from overseas warehouse to consolidation centre could be better/faster.

title: Glad I gave this company a chance
text: Glad I gave this company a chance. I ordered a small item to be shipped from Japan to Singapore, took around 9 days to arrive. Was able to track the package all the way. They charge by actual weight! Much much better than VPOST Singapore, which charged by volumetric weight and quoted me a shipping fee of $140 for a parcel tt weighs 1+kg. Buyandship charged me $33 including insurance. Will use this company again next time!

title: Life changing
text: Life changing! First time user and it was such a seamless process. I had a few questions which customer support provided answers to. It‚Äôs quite amazing to be able to purchase items from the US then have them shipped affordably and promptly to Singapore!

title: no refund support
text:
no refund support 
there is no/little support to facilitate refund/return despite seller offering to do so with no charges for about 30 days upon purchase, and the wrong item was bought, perhaps because of mis/lack of communication or verification. 
Wanted a limited edition item only shipped to overseas, buy and ship bought the regular edition, and now the limited edition is sold out. :(  
i would have considered paying for shipping it back to the country of purchase for a refund.

title: Scam company
text: Scam company, did not state clearly what kind of items can or cannot be shipped. Will withhold your items and give you an extremely short deadline before disposing your items.
reply_text:
Hi Jake,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations.

As we use air freight to transport all parcels, fragrances are considered flammable and therefore not allowed. According to our records, we provided 30 days of free storage before receiving instructions from you on how to dispose of such items.

Regarding prohibited items, our list is regularly updated to reflect the latest policies and customs regulations. You can view the full and current list here: https://www.buyandship.com.sg/restrictions/#all.

Please feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: REALLY TERRIBLE COMPANY
text: If you have a good experience, that purely BY LUCK ONLY. They damaged TWO of my parcels in one shipment and yet refused to take any responsibility. I also had a bottle that is clearly only a dispenser pump (I double checked with the selling company which is a huge platform) but yet they insist is a "compression cannister" and refused to ship it. Also didn't allow me to split my parcels and I ended up having to pay import tax + 5% more HANDLING FEES (of what?????). Really MAJORLY SCREWED UP service. I dunno why vpost gets so muck flack, but buyandship is definitely a million times WORSE. Ship at your own risk and pray for good luck if you do use them.
reply_text:
Hi Rose,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations.

Please note that parcels containing liquids are considered fragile items and are therefore excluded from our parcel protection policy. You can find more details here: https://www.buyandship.com.sg/protection/shipping/. However, we highly value our customers‚Äô experience and are willing to go the extra mile to ensure your satisfaction. Our customer service team will be reaching out to you shortly to discuss the procedure for handling import tax.

Please feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: Terrible customer service.
text:
Seriously the WORST customer service I‚Äôve ever encountered. 
They offer NO help and aren‚Äôt bothered to problem-solve. The customer service officer should not be in customer service at all. She was dismissive, unhelpful and had a horrendous attitude. She is better suited for a job at Karen‚Äôs Diner.

title: Satisfied

title: Trustworthy!
text: Reliable, trustworthy, and always deliver on time. Communication is clear and prompt, and they handle packages with care.

title: Incompetent customer service, zero accountability ‚Äì deeply disappointing experience with Buyandship
text:
My experience with Buyandship was frustrating beyond belief. A parcel I ordered from Japan arrived with severe leakage due to mishandling and repacking. Their team insisted it was the seller‚Äôs fault, but I‚Äôve used Japanese sellers for years and never once had an issue like this ‚Äî their packaging is always extremely secure. The real problem lies in Buyandship‚Äôs repackaging process, where they remove the outer protective boxes to save space. This negligence directly caused the bottles to be exposed and leak during transport.

Worse still, their customer service (especially ‚ÄúRain‚Äù) was unhelpful, dismissive, and evasive. They refused to take responsibility, avoided answering my direct questions, and deleted parts of our conversation. I asked for a supervisor ‚Äî they ignored me. I requested a video to show how my goods were damaged ‚Äî ignored again.

I‚Äôve used many international forwarding services over the years ‚Äî this is by far the worst. They mishandled my goods, then tried to wash their hands of any responsibility. I will never use Buyandship again and would not recommend it to anyone who cares about their items arriving safely.
reply_text:
Hi MsMitochondria,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet your expectations. 

We recognize how disappointing it is to receive a fragile item in less than perfect condition. However, please note that fragile items are excluded from our shopping protection policy, which limits the coverage we can provide in such cases.

We truly value your support and your satisfaction is very important to us. While we are limited in what we can do regarding the packaging, we will do our best to provide assistance after you receive the shipment.

Thank you for your understanding and patience. We are here to assist you with any further questions or concerns you may have. Thank you for your understanding and patience.

MYNYSNHA

title: SCAM AVOID AT ALL COST!!!
text:
SCAM AVOID AT ALL COST!!!

3 years ago(2022) I bought an item from US to ship to Singapore using this service as that product was not in Singapore at that time. I recall it sitting in the warehouse for a while before shipping to SG. 

I read reviews saying they may swap your item with a knockoff if it is a high value item. My item was less than 20 USD so I thought it would be fine.

When we received it in SG we noticed that the item seemed off but there was not enough images online of the actual product to be sure.

I only realised recently that I had gotten scammed when I saw the ACTUAL genuine item in stores in SG. (As the item seemed to now be sold here as well).

Googling more after seeing it in stores, I saw online images of the exact knockoff product that they replaced my item with and likely sold the original off to make a profit.

Seeing other REAL reviews from people it seems that even if I caught it upon receiving my product, their customer service lines and service itself is completely useless! 

I would NOT recommend this company and stray FAR away from it.
reply_text:
Hi Hat, 

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

Since we only handle deliveries from overseas to Singapore, we are unable to verify the validity of sellers or platforms based on the tracking information provided during the declaration. We recommend that users purchase only from trusted, well-known, and verified platforms to avoid such issues.

As the order was placed three years ago, we have limited information to assist you further. Could you please email us at support@buyandship.com.sg with your email address and order number? We‚Äôd be happy to help resolve the issue.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

title: Ignorant BuyForYou agent
text:
Ignorant BuyForYou agent

ECU was not even a prohibited item and they deemed it prohibited AFTER I paid for the item. After talking to support, they confirmed that it was not prohibited and immediately told me to reorder it even tho I have not received my refund yet. Made the payment last 04-28-2025 and until now I have not yet received my refund.

reply_text:
Hi Lanze,

Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We apologize that your experience did not meet the expectations.

According to our records, we have already processed the refund in our system. Please note that the amount was only authorized but not captured since the order was not completed. Depending on your bank‚Äôs policies, it may take up to 45 days for the refund to appear on your card statement. We recommend checking directly with your bank or card issuer for the exact timeframe.

Regarding prohibited items, the list is updated regularly to reflect the latest policies and customs regulations. You can view the full and current list on https://www.buyandship.ph/restrictions/#all.

Please feel free to contact us if you need any further assistance.

Thank you for your patience and understanding.

Hi Yuvaraj, 

Thank you for your feedback! We are committed to providing the best value to our customers and regularly review our pricing and promotions to ensure our rates remain competitive. To help you save on delivery fees, we encourage you to share in Buyaholic or our Facebook group, where you can earn points that can be used to offset the cost of your next delivery. Thank you for your understanding and support.

title: My experience
text: Good and easy to use

title: Trusted Overseas Shopping Services
text:
First time user and I would recommend Buy&Ship service for any overseas shopping.
Parcel status always up to date.
Online customer chat service also very helpful and patient on answering & solve all my doubts.
System navigation also user friendly.
Overall very satisfied and looking forward for next purchase.

title: Great service
text: Great service ! Quick deliveries . Their own buying agents are very responsive and greatcoat quickly executing the purchase which also saves you the hassle putting in the warehouse details. Great value

title: Seamless proxy shipping experience
text: Seamless proxy shipping and delivery experience to doorstep. Keep customer informed at every step of the process. Keep it up.

title: First Time User
text: This is the first time we use the service, we are impressed it is seamless and affordable. We will continue to leverage on the services.

title: Doodoodododoo
text: I appreciate how transparent Buy&Ship is with their costs and updates about the shipping details. Although the proxy shipping costs are not that cheap ($11SGD for 1lb, $9 for each next lb), it's still a standard price among othrr proxy services. I read reviews on many services and Buy&Ship seemed to stand out because of how prompt and helpful they are in answering my queries before I made a shipment. The customer service is amazing and I recommend it!!!!
